perturbation.original_text:
Term
4.
The duration of this Venture (the “Term”) will begin on March 1, 2020 and continue in full force and effect until February 28, 2025 or as
otherwise provided in this Agreement.
5.
The Term may be extended with the unanimous consent of all Members.
perturbation.changed_text:
Term
4.
The duration of this Venture (the “Term”) will begin on March 1, 2020 and continue in full force and effect until February 28, 2025 or as
otherwise provided in this Agreement.
5.
The Term may be extended by a majority vote of the Members.
perturbation.explanation: The original text requires unanimous consent to extend the term. The modified text requires only a majority vote, creating a contradiction regarding the requirements for extending the term of the joint venture. This introduces uncertainty about how an extension would be legally valid.

perturbation.original_text:
Management Voting
42.
Any management vote required will be determined such that each Manager receives one vote carrying equal weight.
perturbation.changed_text:
Management Voting
42.
Any management vote required will be determined such that each Manager receives one vote, with Aldo Piscitello receiving two votes, carrying potentially unequal weight.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stipulates that each manager receives one vote with equal weight. The modified text gives Aldo Piscitello two votes, creating a contradiction by undermining the equality of voting rights. This introduces uncertainty as to how much power each manager really has.

perturbation.original_text:
Duties of Members may be amended, from time to time, by decision of the Members, provided that the Members’ interests are not affected
except with the unanimous consent of the Members.
perturbation.changed_text:
Duties of Members may be amended, from time to time, by decision of the Managers, provided that the Members’ interests are not affected
except with the unanimous consent of the Members.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stipulates that any changes to the duties of members is to be decided by the MEMBERS. The modified text states that this duty falls to the MANAGERS. This introduces uncertainty about who should make those decisions and the power that each group has.
